job.title: Software Engineer - Python/Linux/Cloud
job.description:
Title: Software Engineer
Location: Irvine, CA (Relocation Packages are Available if Needed)
Compensation: Competitive 130k - 150k (DOE)
Requirements: Python, Linux and IoT
Preferred candidates have: Medical Device experience
If you are a Senior Software Engineer with Python and Linux experience, please read on!
We are developing an innovative medical device to treat patients in-home; removing the burden and ultimately increasing the patient's quality of life. Despite the cost of this treatment increasing, only about 1/8 people receive this treatment in-home. Our solution will not only improve the lives of others but also decrease the cost of care.
What You Will Be Doing
"Development of application software based on user needs
" Development test and debug application software
" Prepare design control documents
" Assist in performing development testing, verification, and validation
What You Need for this Position
At least 5+ years of software development experience :
What's In It for You
So, if you are a Software Engineer II - Python with experience, please apply today!
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Nick.Savard@CyberCoders.com
Nick Savard - Sr. Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
